values: The Greatness of God in the Doctrines of Grace: TULIP Session 1The Greatness of God in the Doctrines of Grace: TULIP Session 1

What are the doctrines of grace? Before we wade into the depths of these doctrines, we need to know something of the greatness of God.What are the doctrines of grace? Before we wade into the depths of these doctrines, we need to know something of the greatness of God.
